trans-unit.source: Represents the default settings used to create connections to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Representerer standardinnstillingene brukes til å opprette tilkoblinger til en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ServicePointManagerElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ServicePointManagerElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that controls checking host name information in an X509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som kontrollerer undersøker vert navnet informasjonen i en X509 sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify host name checking; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi kontroll av verten navn; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om det er merket av for sertifikatet mot sertifikatopphevelseslisten for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list as part of the certificate validation process.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, sertifikatet sjekkes mot sertifikatopphevelseslisten for godkjenning som en del av sertifikatet valideringen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sertifikatopphevelseslisten sjekkes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>. Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time after which address information is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid før adresseinformasjon oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property sets the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DnsRefreshTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen angir de <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DnsRefreshTimeout%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DnsRefreshTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies when addresses are resolved using DNS.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir når adresser løses ved hjelp av DNS.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that controls using different IP addresses on connections to the same server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som kontrollerer ved hjelp av en annen IP-adresser på tilkoblinger til den samme serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable DNS round-robin behavior; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>aktivere DNS Ringdistribusjon virkemåte; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy"> </xref> skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> property can require, allow, or prevent encryption.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>egenskapen kan kreve, tillate eller hindre kryptering.</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> will be applied to an SSL/TLS session.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>vil gjelde for en SSL/TLS-økt.</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av Null-cipher kreves når krypteringspolicyen er satt til <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The encryption policy to use for a <xref href="System.Net.ServicePointManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Krypteringspolicyen skal brukes for en <xref href="System.Net.ServicePointManager"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som bestemmer om 100-fortsette virkemåte brukes.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, client requests that use the `POST` method expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, klient-forespørsler som bruker den `POST` metoden forventer en 100-fortsette svar fra serveren for å angi at klienten skal sende data til posteres.

trans-unit.source: This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request.
trans-unit.target: Denne mekanisme gir klienter unngå å sende store mengder data på nettverket når serveren, basert på forespørselshodene, kommer til å avslå forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.Expect100Continue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.Expect100Continue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.Expect100Continue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to expect 100-Continue responses for <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref> requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>forventer 100-fortsette svar på <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""> </xref> forespørsler; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som bestemmer om algoritmen Nagle brukes.

trans-unit.source: The Nagle algorithm is used to reduce network traffic by buffering small packets of data and transmitting them as a single packet.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen Nagle brukes til å redusere nettverkstrafikk av bufring lavt pakker med data og overføre dem som en enkelt pakke.

trans-unit.source: This process is also referred to as "nagling"; it is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet.
trans-unit.target: Denne prosessen kalles også "nagling"; Det er mye brukt fordi det reduserer antall pakker overføres og senker overhead per pakke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Bruke algoritmen Nagle; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
